about_the_game:
Enjoy a lot of fun in this popular game where you have to face the traps and time your jump correctly.
It's never been more fun to jump and run ahead of your opponents and leave them behind.
Be the royal king and enjoy your victory.

Avoid the chasm and water or lava. Prove that you can time your jump correctly.
You don't have to be the first at the finish line, but above all to survive, and still, it's about first place.

Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected?
Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer.

The game includes multiple maps and the option to create your own server.
Invite your whole family or friends and challenge them to a duel.
Be a royal king. There is only one!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon A8 7600 or Intel I5-3470
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 240 or Nvidia GT730 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600 or Intel Intel Core i5-7700K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570 Or Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Royale King

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $0.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $0.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy Royale King Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit or Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon A8 7600 or Intel I5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 240 or Nvidia GT730 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit or Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600 or Intel Intel Core i5-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570 Or Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Win and be the royal king only you! Think right and jump at the right time.. Only one can win! Be it you!
supported_languages:
English*, Czech
*languages with full audio support
